plot outline: This Story revolves around a Young lady played by K.R.Vijaya who lost her memory accidently & moved to new City where he Met the Hero and Fall in love with him. After marrying to him in an another accident she lost the memories of her marriage. Finally Ravichandran Meets her in person where she is engaged to another person. Packed with Full Time Comedy of Nagesh & Cho.
title: Ninaivil Nindraval
